about_the_game:
"Shut Up and Dance" is a story-rich adult visual novel which tells the story of a young man's life taking a turn for the worse and everything going downhill instantly.
A beloved person dies under suspicious circumstances, and in the blink of an eye, the life you're used to is gone - a cozy home, plenty of money and food, college tuition paid in full.
Your carefree life - everything gone in a heartbeat.



As it stands now, there seems no way out of this. You decide to leave school and start working to help with the current situation, both financially and emotionally. Until out of the blue, our protagonist receives an exciting job offer from an unexpected quarter that promises to improve things.

But is it going to be a curse or a blessing?
Well, that will be up to you as you call the shots and make the decisions.



Pure Visual Novel

There's no unnecessary sandbox and grind elements that don't bring anything to the gameplay.

Choices That Matter

The game has a lot of different story branches that can give you a different experience during every new play-through.

Amazing Animations

The game is heavily animated and lets you choose the video speed you prefer.

High-Quality Renders

Lots of images show every scene in all its juicy details.

Huge Gallery

Return to your favorite scenes and open new ones over and over again.

More than 5700 static images and 350 animations!

You can be sure you won't be disappointed by the visuals.

content_descriptors.notes:
IMPORTANT!
This game is for adults only. The story and characters are fictional.
The game contains nudity, violence, use of alcohol, smoking, graphical depictions of sexual acts. All sexual acts in the game are consensual. All the characters are 18 or older.
